author: mrmitch
title: Bulk bricks in a color thats hard to find in volume
review: If you like to create light grey is a cool color to use due to the castle theme and arch elements. You very rarely find them in tubs or buckets if at all. I like to have my options open when building freestyle so I picked up this bag and use them alot.

author: Irene
title: Very useful set.
review:
This bag of bricks has been useful when extending walls, and other elements for my Harry Potter sets.  Most notably, it has become part of the Quiddage field.

Also useful with the Grey arches.
